column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------Â ------A ------drunken man drove a Toyota into a road divider at 1.30 am on May 1
column5: in front of Toul Kork Market along Street 289 in Boeung Kok II
column6: Khan Toul Kork.------According to the source
column7: the car was travelling at high speed south along 289 street. It clipped the divider and flipped onto its side.------Immediately
column8: the driver jumped from the car and scarpered from the scene leaving only the car at a 90 degree angle.------After the incident
column9: the local authorities took the vehicle to Phnom Penh Police Commission to wait for the owner to come and make a legal settlement. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/436234
